DOC.brief_title: Omega-3 Fatty Acids ( Lovaza ) Second Generation Antipsychotic-Associated Hypertriglyceridemia
DOC.detailed_description: This open-label pilot study omega-3 fatty acid ( Lovaza ) hypertriglyceridemia subject atypical ( second generation ) antipsychotic medication . Eligible subject include men woman , age 18-75 , take atypical antipsychotic least three month prior enrollment . Atypical antipsychotic include : clozapine ( Clozaril ) , olanzapine ( Zyprexa ) , risperidone ( Risperdal ) , aripiprazole ( Abilify ) , ziprasidone ( Geodon ) , quetiapine ( Seroquel ) , paliperidone ( Invega ) , asenapine ( Saphris ) , iloperidone ( Fanapt ) , lurasidone ( Latuda ) . Eligible subject must also serum triglyceride > 200 mg/dl high cholesterol > 250 mg/dl baseline .
